structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

text.section:
Sec. 19-10. Flammable rubbish.
Waste paper, boxes, shavings, rubbish or other flammable materials, shall not be allowed to accumulate on any lots. Brush, wood, and other flammable material shall not be allowed within fifty (50) feet of containers of gas, gasoline, dynamite or other highly flammable or explosive materials.
